marketName: UCL: Marseille vs Liverpool - Total Passes
question: How many total passes will be completed in the Marseille vs Liverpool match?
description: Predict the total number of completed passes by both teams combined in the UEFA Champions League match between Marseille and Liverpool on January 21, 2026 at 8:00 PM UTC.
resolutionCriteria:
This market resolves based on the total number of completed passes by both teams combined during the UEFA Champions League match between Marseille and Liverpool.

Resolution Source: Google match statistics
Match Time: January 21, 2026 at 8:00 PM UTC
Bidding Deadline: January 21, 2026 at 9:45 PM UTC
Resolution Time: January 21, 2026 at 10:30 PM UTC

Counting Rules:
- Only completed/successful passes count
- Passes from both teams are combined
- Statistics as reported by Google match stats
